page.title: 18 A KING'S MOSS CHILD'S DAY
page.content: The alarm woke me at 8am and I had a cup of tea and a crumpet for breakfast. I walked to the minibus which took me to school and then the school bell went at 8:55am. The teacher took the register and we went into assembly.In assembly we sang two hymns,said a prayer and listened to a story.We had a percentages and tables test in maths,and then did some work on fractions.After a 15 minute break,when I played football,we did some work on spellings. For school dinner we had baked beans, chips and hamburger followed by custard and chocolate cake.In the afternoon we had craft in which I was making a house out of balsa wood.We studied a house in Crank in History.When I got home I wat- ched TV,played football and snooker before going to bed at 9:30pm. (RICHARD MATTHEWS AGE 10)
